snippet.title: Recursed - Release trailer
snippet.description:
Steam store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/497780/

Recursed is a puzzle game where rooms are items. Twist the world into different situations to finish the levels.

Coming to Windows, Mac and Linux on Steam soon.
